channel.title: F2p Pure guide
channel.description:
[B]This is my first guide so tell me what you think =P[/B]
[B]Items needed[/B] Iron helm Iron plate Iron kite Iron legs Ammy of power / str Iron scimmi Steel scimmi Mith scimmi Addy scimmi Rune scimmi Around 100gp
[COLOR="Red"]1 - 10 attke[/COLOR] First go to the desert and fill your bag with kerbab you can buy these from the kerbab store for only 1gp =p heres a pic just in case u dont no
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/6/10/17/f_iim_c343370.png&srv=img27][IMG]http://img27.picoodle.com/img/img27/6/10/17/f_iim_c343370.png[/img][/URL]
Now you got your kebabs! train at the level 2 - 3 men just outside the place
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/6/10/17/f_ergrm_45881eb.png&srv=img27][IMG]http://img27.picoodle.com/img/img27/6/10/17/f_ergrm_45881eb.png[/img][/URL]
GRATZ your 10 attke + 10 str
[COLOR="red"]10 - 40 attke and str[/COLOR]
This is a very good and well known trainning place for most f2p pures! 'monks' Also they heal so u dont need to worry about dieing =p
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/6/10/17/f_hhm_53a9af1.png&srv=img27][IMG]http://img27.picoodle.com/img/img27/6/10/17/f_hhm_53a9af1.png[/img][/URL]
[B]GRATZ YOUR 40 ATTKE 40 STR[/B]
Now you got your 40 attke.. its staying like that.. now for 40+ str now the bestes place i can recommend for over 40 str... is this place... heres a pic
PS bring some trout just in case =p
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?img=/6/10/17/f_vm_7020ff3.png&srv=img27][IMG]http://img27.picoodle.com/img/img27/6/10/17/f_vm_7020ff3.png[/img][/URL]
[B]Well theres my first guide i hope it helps if so please post xD and gl if you have any question then just pm me on sythe or add my msn witch is in my sig =p[/B]

item.title: F2p Pure guide
item.dc:creator: @_My_p_hat †My_p_hat†
item.description:
@_My_p_hat wrote:

This is my first guide so tell me what you think =P

Items needed
Iron helm
Iron plate
Iron kite
Iron legs
Ammy of power / str
Iron scimmi
Steel scimmi
Mith scimmi
Addy scimmi
Rune scimmi
Around 100gp

[COLOR=“Red”]1 - 10 attke[/COLOR]
First go to the desert and fill your bag with kerbab you can buy these from the kerbab store for only 1gp =p heres a pic just in case u dont no

Now you got your kebabs! train at the level 2 - 3 men just outside the place

GRATZ your 10 attke + 10 str

[COLOR=“red”]10 - 40 attke and str[/COLOR]

This is a very good and well known trainning place for most f2p pures! ‘monks’
Also they heal so u dont need to worry about dieing =p

GRATZ YOUR 40 ATTKE 40 STR

Now you got your 40 attke… its staying like that… now for 40+ str now the bestes place i can recommend for over 40 str… is this place… heres a pic

PS bring some trout just in case =p

Well theres my first guide i hope it helps if so please post xD and gl if you have any question then just pm me on sythe or add my msn witch is in my sig =p

Read full topic
